reviewText:
La recomiendo mucho para la gente Catolica. Yo asistia a la Iglesia los Domingos y salia de ahi igual como entraba, sin entender la importancia de la salvacion en aceptar a Jesus como tu Salvador. Esta pelicula explica sencillamente como ir al Cielo con Jesus cuando tu cuerpo muere. Sencillamente, acepta a Jesus como tu Salvador.

I recommend it for Catholic people, I used to go to Church on Sundays and would come out of there the same as I went in, not understanding the importance of being saved when you accept Jesus as your Savior. This movie explains what you need to know and what you need to do to go to Heaven when your dies, just as simple as that, accept Jesus as you Savior.
